sec1.title: Create an invite-only place where you belong
sec1.desc: Discord servers are organized into topic-based channels where you can collaborate, share, and just talk about your day without clogging up a group chat.

sec2.title: Where hanging out is easy
sec2.desc: Grab a seat in a voice channel when you’re free. Friends in your server can see you’re around and instantly pop in to talk without having to call.

sec3.title: From few to a fandom
sec3.desc: Get any community running with moderation tools and custom member access. Give members special powers, set up private channels, and more.

sec4.title: Reliable tech for staying close
sec4.desc: Low-latency voice and video feels like you’re in the same room. Wave hello over video, watch friends stream their games, or gather up and have a drawing session with screen share.
